about.profile-1: I’m passionate about technology and design, focused on creating seamless user experiences with intuitive and visually appealing interfaces. I specialize in front-end development using Vue.js and Nuxt.js, collaborating closely with designers and developers to build responsive, user-friendly applications.
about.profile-2: I enjoy exploring new technologies, understanding user behavior, and bridging the gap between design and development to craft meaningful digital experiences. Always eager to learn and grow, I aim to contribute to innovative projects that push the boundaries of technology and design.

experience.description: Focused on front-end development using Vue.js and Nuxt.js, working collaboratively with developers and UX/UI designers to create user-friendly, intuitive applications that enhance overall user experience. Researched client-side rendering (CSR) and successfully implemented SEO-friendly pre-rendered pages to improve site visibility and optimize performance. Additionally, developed responsive web designs to ensure seamless functionality and a consistent user experience across multiple devices and platforms.

kmutt.name: King Mongkut's University of Technology Thonburi

projects.title: WORK & PROJECTS
projects.description: Here are some of my projects that showcase my skills and experience in software development. Each project highlights different aspects of my work, from front-end development to full-stack applications.

meiji.name: CP-Meiji x House of Dev Technology
meiji.description: Developed interactive features for CP-Meiji's World Milk Day event, enabling visitors to engage with milk products through innovative digital experiences. Proud to contribute as a developer to making the event memorable and educational.

HOD-Landing.name: HOD Landing Page
HOD-Landing.description: is a landing page designed to showcase the services and expertise of House of Dev Technology. It features a modern and professional design, highlighting the company's offerings and providing easy navigation for potential clients.

verscan.name: Verscan
verscan.description: Integrated file upload into the Verscan system, added blog and partner sections to the landing page, along with speed improvements for a better user experience.

bluuu.name: Bluuu
bluuu.description: Developed a maid booking platform featuring user-friendly interface, reservation management, and payment integration for seamless professional cleaning service bookings.

pocumi.name: Pocumi Landing Page
pocumi.description: is a landing page for the Pocumi product, designed to introduce the solution and highlight how it improves efficiency and tracks procurement movements with a comprehensive and user-friendly approach.

crystallyte.name: Crystallyte Landing Page
crystallyte.description: is a landing page for Crystallyte, showcasing their innovative process for producing high-yield crystalline carbon nanomaterials from sources like CO₂ and plastic waste.

greeneryofnorth.name: Greenery of North
greeneryofnorth.description: is a landing page inviting travelers to experience Northern Thailand’s rainy season, highlighting lush landscapes, local culture, unique cuisine, and creative arts and activities.

inu.name: INU 2
inu.description: is a web-based QMS for engineering education, featuring a new UI and expanded tools for TABEE and ABET accreditation, course data management, outcome tracking, and reporting.

tradekub.name: Tradekub
tradekub.description: is a website used to trade securities online, designed to make it more convenient for investors to issue stock orders. It acts as an intermediary between brokers and users in conducting transactions. Additionally, we implemented real-time stock price tracking and dynamic chart rendering, allowing users to monitor price movements and trends directly within the platform.

modx.name: ModX
modx.description: is an online shopping platform designed specifically for the KMUTT bookstore. It provides a user-friendly interface for students and faculty to browse and purchase books and other educational materials.

savorly.name: Savorly
savorly.description: , your comprehensive meal companion designed to seamlessly address the challenges of your busy lifestyle.  to make your days more comfortable by revolutionizing the way you approach meals.

c1.title: Google UX Design Specialization
c1.desc: Completed an intensive, hands-on specialization focused on the core principles of user experience design. Developed expertise in conducting user research, creating wireframes and prototypes, and applying interaction design best practices. Gained practical experience in designing intuitive, user-centered digital products through real-world projects and collaborative assignments.

c2.title: Advanced React
c2.desc: Progressed through the Meta Front-End Developer Professional Certificate, completing 6 out of 9 courses. Acquired advanced skills in building scalable and maintainable React applications, including state management, component architecture, and performance optimization. Enhanced proficiency in modern front-end development workflows and best practices.
